rev.desc.rev.desc: QC7473 - Changed normal exit on the 'add.dbdict' panel to 'decide.special'. Added filter conditions for the 'patchreltoc' table on decision panels 'decide.call.dbdict' and 'decide.special'. Also, removed orphaned application panels when compiled.
(DE4436) Call sqlmap before doing the fcreate on the dbdict so that the dbdict has sqlmapping.
Add a special case to not go to sysdef or the dbdict screens when creating the upgradetoc file.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
devtx ticket I2297 - if your fieldname contains the string "Field", it creates a structure even if you wanted a text field.
on panel, loop.body changed the test for "Field" to test for "Field="
added decision panel, decide.call.file.utility which goes to process panel, call.file.utility.sysdef, if you're in the eclipse client or call.file.utility (original panel) if you're not.
Modified to use local variables and properly construct an array of structures from a table.

descript.descript: QC7473 - Changed normal exit on the 'add.dbdict' panel to 'decide.special'. Added filter conditions for the 'patchreltoc' table on decision panels 'decide.call.dbdict' and 'decide.special'. Also, removed orphaned application panels when compiled.
(DE4436) Call sqlmap before doing the fcreate on the dbdict so that the dbdict has sqlmapping.
Add a special case to not go to sysdef or the dbdict screens when creating the upgradetoc file.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
devtx ticket I2297 - if your fieldname contains the string "Field", it creates a structure even if you wanted a text field.
on panel, loop.body changed the test for "Field" to test for "Field="
added decision panel, decide.call.file.utility which goes to process panel, call.file.utility.sysdef, if you're in the eclipse client or call.file.utility (original panel) if you're not.
Modified to use local variables and properly construct an array of structures from a table.
